GOODMUON: (Muon_pt>20 and abs(Muon_eta)<2.4 and Muon_isGlobal and Muon_isTracker and abs(Muon_dz)<0.10 and abs(Muon_dxy) < 0.05)
LOOSEmuons: (Muon_pt>10 and abs(Muon_eta)<2.4 and Muon_isGlobal and Muon_isTracker and Muon_pfRelIso04_all < 0.25 and abs(Muon_dz)<0.10 and abs(Muon_dxy) < 0.05 and Muon_looseId)
GOODELE: (Electron_pt>20 and abs(Electron_eta)<2.5 and Electron_cutBased >= 2 and abs(Electron_dxy) < 0.2 && abs(Electron_dz) < 0.5)
LOOSEelectrons: (Electron_pt>10 and abs(Electron_eta) < 2.5 and Electron_pfRelIso03_all < 0.25 and abs(Electron_dz)<0.5 and abs(Electron_dxy) < 0.2 && Electron_mvaFall17V2noIso_WPL)
GOODJETS: (Jet_pt>30 && abs(Jet_eta)<5 and (Jet_jetId & 2) and jet_mask and jet_mask2)

mesons.name: isVBF
mesons.definition: (rho_kin_mass>0.6 && rho_kin_mass<0.95 && rho_kin_pt>20 && rho_trk1_pt>5 && rho_trk2_pt>5 && rho_kin_valid && rho_iso > 0.9)

mesons.name: VH
mesons.definition: (rho_kin_mass>0.6 && rho_kin_mass<0.95 && rho_kin_pt>10 && rho_trk1_pt>5 && rho_trk2_pt>5 && rho_kin_valid && rho_iso > 0.8)
